mapper.sql: dict_id, dict_pid, dict_name, dict_code, dict_order, create_time, update_time, creator, updator
mapper.select: SELECT sysd.dict_id AS dictId, sysd.dict_pid AS dictPid, sysd.dict_name AS dictName, sysd.dict_code AS dictCode, sysd.dict_order AS dictOrder, sysd.create_time AS createTime, sysd.update_time AS updateTime, sysuc.user_realName AS creator, sysuu.user_realName AS updator FROM sys_dict AS sysd LEFT JOIN sys_user sysuc ON sysd.creator = sysuc.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sysuu ON sysd.updator = sysuu.user_id WHERE 1 = 1
